messages.content: What is the purpose of the StableZero123 node in ComfyUI?
The StableZero123 node uses the Zero123plus model to generate 3D views from a single image.
What repository should be cloned to install the StableZero123 node?
The repository URL provided in the documentation: https://github.com/SUDO-AI-3D/zero123plus/
What is the installation process for the StableZero123 node?
The node can be installed by cloning the repository into ComfyUI/custom_nodes and then restarting ComfyUI.
What is the expected input image requirement for using the StableZero123 node?
The input image should be a square.
What is the current development status of the StableZero123 node?
The node is under development and being used at the user's own risk. The interface is likely to change, which may impact existing workflows in future versions.
What is planned for the next steps in the development of StableZero123 or related nodes?
The development plan includes creating a new node that uses ControlNet to add depth information and improve image quality.
